Full Description: 2ASPIRE comes from an idea elaborated by the team while working on a research project in the Software Engineering unit at Fondazione Bruno Kessler (FBK). FBK is not only a widely known research center located in Trento, Italy, but also a stimulating place to make brilliant intuitions become first ideas and then solutions. 2ASPIRE was born with the intention of exploiting the awesome results of ASPIRE, a research project of 3 years (2013-2016) funded by the European Union. The project was a success, putting together European excellences from academia and industry to bring mobile software protections to the next new level. In concrete, ASPIRE involved FBK, and the Software Engineering research unit, with the objective of elaborating and integrating novel and strong protection approaches to defend smartphone apps against tampering attacks.
Industries: Apps, Information Technology, Mobile, Mobile Apps, Software
Description: A security solution for mobile developers, to help them in protecting their incomes from cyber criminals.

Full Description: In D.O.C. wines the process must be validated by external laboratories which certify the product and approve for admission and retention of the mark. The biosensor DiVino is a wine measuring instrument that allows you to control the various parameters of wine comfortably in the cellar, thereby allowing you to have control any time of the malic and lactic transformation, the reducing sugars and the ethanol. A truly innovative tool that works in a simple and precise way and thereby allowing you to monitor the entire production cycle with considerable savings in time and costs. Five tests in one instrument: The biosensor DiVino is the first measuring instrument that allows to run a series of tests with the same appliance. Just dilute the wine with water, add a specific amount of reagent solution, add a drop or two into the funnel cell and then select the on the keyboard the analyse that has to be measured. Wait a few minutes and the value (in g/l or %/vol) appears on the display. Measures: Glucose Fructose Glucose + fructose Malic acid Lactic acid (L, D, L + D) Reducing sugars The advantage for you? You can keep the quality of your wine under control whenever you want and at extremely low costs. Measurements are performed by a properly sized biosensor in a portable and compact size for use.
Industries: Biotechnology, Hardware, Health Care, Manufacturing, Wine And Spirits
Description: 3CI offers Divine, a measurement tool for the analysis of reducing sugars, malic acid, lactic acid, and ethanol in wine.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Food and Beverage, Hardware, Health Care, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering

Full Description: Adriacell is a biotech company whose focus is the development of solutions (treatment and diagnostics) for tumors characterized by low probability of survival for patients and of anti infective agents. It leverages its efforts and scientific expertise to (i) develop a new class of anti-tumor therapeutics and (ii) create a series of powerful diagnostics for the early detection of cancer progression. The company is also developing new and highly powerful delivery solutions through small molecules as the basis for a new class of anti-infective drugs.  Adriacell owns a patented system that can be used for the study of events subsequent to DNA double strand breaks, which is a very important issue for cancer research and diagnostics.  The company is currently evaluating a new class of therapeutics for cancer; its main compound is about to enter the pharmacokinetic and toxicology phases.
Description: Anti-tumor therapeutics

All their unmanned solutions are core based on the CANaerospace Command & Control (C2) protocol, a free available and royality free upper layer aviation protocol for the CAN bus, developed by Stock Flight Systems. A2Tech and its Technology Partners (Wetzel Technologies, Stock Flight Systems, Reiser Systemtechnik) have focused on the development of a new generation of Universal Ground Control Cockpit (UGCC), branded "RealityVISION - Unmanned Vehicle Pilot Systems", a modular Avionic Suite branded DARWIN A3 - Advanced Avionic Architecture, driven by CANaerospace and ARINC-825.

Full Description: Aleveo is a new approach to open innovation and recruiting, as a social innovation that brings students and companies closer through sharing of ideas, while raising youth employability and providing companies with constructive, creative feedback as innovation support. Aleveo involves students in practical tasks of companies, bringing them closer to the world of work. It creates more opportunities for youth's future, thus promoting self-initiation, innovation and entrepreneurship culture across universities. On the Aleveo's website, students, but also everyone else, "push" their ideas and projects to companies they think could be of practical use to, by tagging them with some of the tags companies are "listening" on. These ideas can be of any category - design, advertising, marketing, architecture etc. - the very latent knowledge about companies, their offerings and presence. All ideas are pre-approved before going public and reaching companies, preventing spam, thus are visible to everyone for further improvements and building upon. The best ideas are continuously given awards of sponsorships, recognitions, honors, internships and possibly jobs.  As a student-centric service, the simplistic online tool is free for students and companies to use. Companies and small teams can use the tool for soliciting and evaluating internal ideas, receive external ones on defined tags, as well open jobs and internal challenges. Additional plans are available, named "Supporter" and "Sponsor", offering public challenges and official sponsorships respectively. Online payments are still not available, but interested companies may contact the founders for immediate upgrades.
Industries: Crowdsourcing, File Sharing, Recruiting, Social Media, Universities
Description: Connects Youth and Companies
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Other, Professional Services, Software

Full Description: Altea power monitoring solutions is a young, innovative, privately owned company, focused on the development of innovative sensors for the measurement of voltage and current in Low, medium and high voltage power grids. Altea´s headquarters are based in the Netherlands with a production / R&D facility in Italy, a sales & marketing office in the USA , which covers the North American markets and a sales & marketing office in the UAE covering Asia. Altea started operations in 2009 with the design and testing of its first innovative capacitive sensor for indoor, air insulated applications. After the successful placement of this new sensor across Italy, a new family of combined , voltage and current sensors have been developed to customers´needs for indoor, outdoor and gas insulated sub stations. To date Altea´s sensors have been successfully deployed in many different countries across the world couples with a 9001 ISO certification. Throughout our seven years of operations Altea has brought together seasoned executives in new business development and engineers with broad experiences, all with the common goal of the search and development of new and innovative cutting edge technology. We strive to design, develop and deploy innovative Voltage and current sensors which are or will become indispensable tools for real time management and diagnosis of Energy Distribution delivered using both overhead and underground lines.
Description: Development of innovative sensors for the measurement of voltage and current in Low, medium and high voltage power grids.

Full Description: AnswerToit provides Users' Opinion Analytics. AnswerTo.it is a complete polling and opinions tracking instrument, that provides different tools, oriented to different needs and markets, sharing the same social engine and users. The social key of AnswerTo.it is the focus on real opinions: we ask to the users to share what they think, not what they prefer in a list of choices. Beyond the social platform and a poll library for websites integration, AnswerTo.it is oriented to "channels", the platform for asking questions and polling for radios and TVs: today there's no a single web platform oriented to this market. Noteworthy is the AnswerTo.it meaning of Surveys: with our platform there are no predefined markets to ask a question or give a poll; all the users on answerto.it can answer, and the merchant can filter all the results with a simple and smooth UI, discovering new markets and enhancing the market knowledge.
Description: User's Opinion Analytics

Full Description: Apache Group srl nasce a Treviso nel 2012, frutto di precedenti esperienze nel settore ICT & IT, soprattutto in ambiti quali software e soluzioni Cloud ed il loro relativo sviluppo commerciale.La società è nata ed è tutt’ora composta, da giovani imprenditori che hanno creduto e credono, che nel nostro paese ci sia ancora molto su cui investire. La nostra attività si basa su tre fronti, composti da tre diversi attori del mercato, ad ognuno dei quali abbiamo dedicato un apposito progetto.   Apache For Vendors si rivolge a tutte quelle realtà che hanno realizzato una propria soluzione informatica (preferibilmente software & Cloud) e che intendono renderla disponibile al mercato tramite rivenditori e/o partner territoriali. Tali soluzioni vengono chiaramente analizzate e valutate precedentemente in modo da garantire al mercato solo le migliori soluzioni possibili. Apache For Resellers si rivolge a tutte le aziende informatiche presenti sul territorio e che intendono avvalersi di prodotti e/o servizi di alto livello, in modo da poter condurre la propria attività nel migliore dei modi ed in maniera sostenibile ed innovativa.Apache For End Users è dedicato a tutti i soggetti ( privati, aziende e/o enti ) che necessitano di servizi informatici per proprio uso e consumo. Grazie ad una attenta selezione dei migliori Vendors e delle migliori soluzioni, ed avvalendoci della collaborazione dei migliori Partner sul territorio,i quali vengono formati e certificati, forniamo i migliori servizi in tutto il territorio Italiano.    Quali sono linee guida Apache Group ?  Sostenibilità: Utilizzare l’innovazione per migliorare la vita aziendale, sia in ambito economico che funzionale.    Networking: Ognuno ha le proprie capacità ed i propri limiti, collaborare con gli altri ci rende completi.    Eccellenza: E’ sempre necessario puntare al massimo e fondamentale in ambito aziendale. Non sempre è possibile, ma proviamoci.    Semplificazione: Perché la semplicità rende la vita migliore, rende il rapporto con gli altri migliore e più liberi.    Software: Presente e futuro del nostro mondo passano dai software. Sta a noi utilizzargli al meglio.
Description: Italian software network

Full Description: Apps Launcher is a global, integrated and strategic marketing platform entirely dedicated to the world of Apps. Apps Launcher’s purpose is to help developers and owners in promoting their Apps both in the launch phase and in increasing their downloads.  Where did the idea come from? Company founders Fabio Bancalà and Alessandra Massaro were planning to launch a social app on their own so they focused their attention to the apps market. There are presently 800k app in the stores, a number that experts say will increase up to 5 million in the next 5 years. Huge! Here is the idea: instead of competing against 5 million people and teams of developers behind the apps, why do not see them as customers and help them to reach their goals. Apps market is presently booming but there is still a lack in services dedicated to these Apps. Supplying this lack is this start-up value proposition. Apps Launcher aspires to become leader in marketing services for devs and app owners, first in Europe and among the first in the world. Through an accurate mailing service this start-up sends its customer’s press releases to thousand newspapers, specialized reviews and magazines, high tech blogs, influencers, investors, users from more than 30 countries. Customizable web pages, strategic and viral marketing, social media marketing are other main services that show how this start-up believes in social power.  The management has a clear business development strategy, divided into 3 phases: •	Launching the platform, including a fundraising campaign on Indiegogo ( months 1-6 ); •	Consolidation in the US market - the leading market, including opening an office in New York area, hiring two developers and a social media marketing specialist, and a seed funding round from VC ( months 6-24 ); •	Opening new sales development channels in China and India, Apps Launcher second main markets, including an office in Hong Kong  ( months 24-48 ). To achieve these goals, the management is developing strategic partnerships with some other branding start-ups in Silicon Valley. Apps Launcher has planned a fair reselling program dedicated to developers and marketing consultants and firms to develop its business with an international vision. Apps Launcher is also an easy tool for users to stay tuned on apps just launched. In the next few days the Newco will raise funds on Indiegogo with perks, discounts and subscriptions for its bakers. Apps Launcher motto is “the best way to promote your app”.
Industries: Advertising, Apps, Brand Marketing, Crowdfunding, Mobile, Non Profit
Description: Apps Launcher is an software app that helps to install new software in PC and smart devices.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Resonance AI is a key enabler to new generations of smart devices designed to: Listen to people's behavior across apps and devices Act accordingly with the desired action in the right moment for a magic experience Analyze the patterns and get the most out of them It provides a framework for cross-device interactions to brands and device manufacturers that needs their products to make the best of the Internet of Things layer potential.  Most of the existing solutions for the Internet of Things provide strictly verticalized use cases, building ecosystems basically blind to any horizontal cross-device interaction. On the other hand, Atooma team is developing different SDKs for each of the main fragmented sectors of the IoT market, such as: automotive, home automation, wearables, and mobile devices. Also, as last step of integration within the platform, Atooma has developed a “suggestion engine” that makes use of the big data coming from user’s behavior monitoring, pro-actively suggesting them coherent and contextual use cases fitting their lifestyle, based on how they used the context-aware device. “Context awareness is not just a buzz word, we are building the fast track for the full participation in the contextual era for the internet of things players.”  - Fabrizio Cialdea, CEO of Atooma

Full Description: Authix Tecnologies is a Torino based start-up supplying a comprehensive authentication solution to major brands. The solution allows product authentication through the use of standard mobile phones.  Currently, consumers of medications and branded consumer items have no way to check the product authenticity of the item they wish to purchase. Authix solution will provide consumers with a reliable and easy-to-use method of checking that the product they are about to purchase is original and genuine or to discover a fake.  Authix is designing a small unique tag that will be inserted in each package or within the item to be purchased. At time of purchase, the consumer communicates through the cell phone with that tag, and receives a message on the phone display indicating whether the product is genuine or counterfeit.  Brand manufacturers are expected to the tags and the authentication services as follows: (i) manufacturers buy the brand tags from Authix, (ii) Authix maintain an authentication server which is accessed 24/7 by Internet, SMS or Instant Messaging, (iii) the manufacturers pay Authix for the Service.
Description: Authix Technologies is a Torino-based startup supplying a comprehensive authentication solution to major brands.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Hardware, Internet Services, Privacy and Security

Full Description: In times when life as a new parent may seem overwhelming, Baby 2.0 is going to come to your rescue. Baby2.0 is a fun way to keep track of your baby-related activities; thanks to its intuitive user interface, Baby 2.0 will make the recording (and the retrieving for statistical analysis and to identify patterns ) of your child’s precious information waaaay easier. No lack of sleep will prevent you from taking notes of personal data, useful info, paps, diaper changes, medical appointments, periodic measurements OR from keeping a diary of your child’s special moments and milestones. Baby 2.0 comes to the App Store in a Free and Premium version. The Free version allows you to manage one baby only. The Premium version adds the ability to manage multiple babies, to share and sync your info on multiple devices (mom, dad, doctor, nanny…), and to operate data backup and data export. FEATURES PROFILE: your baby’s basic info (date of birth, sex, weight, height, head size) INFOS: tracking of additional useful info (Social Security Number, Tax code, National Health Service Card, Blood Type…etc.) PAPS: tracking of feedings (time, quantities, duration and notes) DIAPERS: tracking of diapers changes by typology: pee, poo, pee & poo (with those dreadful “overflows“ trackable in the “notes“ section) VISITS: tracking of medical appointments and vaccination schedules MEASUREMENTS: tracking of periodical weight height and head size measurements. Such data are subsequently displayed in the “stats“ section. EVENTS: a reminder about upcoming events, appointments, shopping needs (diapers… diapers… DIAPERS!) etc. DIARY: a feature allowing the user to create a personal diary where each entry (specified by date and time) is composed of a title, text and photography. Diary contents are optionally shareable on some social networks (Facebook, Twitter).
Industries: Android, Apps, Baby, Health Care, iOS, Mobile, Social Media
Description: Baby2.0 enables parents to keep track of their baby-related activities through an intuitive user interface.

Full Description: Weight, vital signs as well as sleep activity monitoring is as important as difficult to accomplish in a continuative and precise way. Bscale wants to develop simple and discreet tools able to monitor vital parameters of singles and families, with a particular attention to the nocturne activity. Our mission is  to revolutionise the monitoring of those parameters in order to improve the quality of life in particular the one of sensitive users. Four or more sensors, according to the number of bed legs, are placed between the floor and the bed of the user. Weight, vibrations and micro-oscillations generated by the human body are collected by the system, saved and converted to information. The system consists of one Master sensor, constantly plugged into and three or more sensors called Slaves powered by a rechargeable battery each. They are in communication with the Master through a wireless protocol.
Industries: Health Care, Health Diagnostics, Home Health Care, Internet of Things, Personal Health, Quantified Self, Smart Home

Full Description: BuskerLabel is a crowdfunding platform to finance and distribute free music under Creative Commons license. BuskerLabel innovates the music business focusing on the excitement during the period preceding an album's release. Once tracks are out, nobody can stop the digital media from being copied and shared, but before the release date getting access to music is a privilege of great value. As most of the major labels complain, releasing music in digital form is a critical moment since it starts a huge wave of downloading and sharing activity.  Licensing under Creative Commons allows music lovers to share tracks legally, while giving money to get early access to music gives them the status of co-producers and satisfies their curiosity.  BuskerLabel blends these two factors aiming to turn former copyright violators–so called "pirates"–into True Fans. The model goes beyond simple donations for music that is already available for free; it also excludes the launch of project funding before going in the recording studio.  Music lovers visiting BuskerLabel listen to promo tracks and then, acting as talent scouts, satisfy their curiosity by paying a few Koins to get early access to the new album in its entirety. The Koin is the currency internal to BuskerLabel with a value of 1 Euro each, and can be purchased conveniently using PayPal or a credit card. BuskerLabel passes on to the artists 80% of the collected money right after the release date! Any artist is now able to quickly get money from their True Fans, with the simple action of uploading tracks, choosing a release date, and starting the collecting phase.  Listening to the freely available promo tracks, fans choose if it is worth to pay one or more Koins, and if they do, they can immediately play back the entire album, and recommend it to friends through their usual social networks. After the chosen date, the album is released under a Creative Commons license allowing all Internet users to freely download and share tracks for personal use. Creative Commons licenses allow to maximize the legal music diffusion by bringing more and more fans to the artist for subsequent releases and, most importantly, for live tours that depend mostly on the “brand awareness“ of the artist's name.
Description: Crowdfunding for music releases.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Other, Social Impact
Founders: Giovanni Conte, Giulio De Luise, Pancrazio Auteri

Full Description: Promote your website using just your first name for $1.00 for an entire year to gain an unlimited amount of hits at www.claimitforfame.com. Claim Your Name For Fame was first created as part of a social experiment project to see how effective marketing and advertising can help push a product or service. We have since turned this experiment into a marketing and advertising contest. In order to accomplish this contest, CYN has set up a unique and creative way for anyone to be able to promote their own personal website such as their myspace, facebook, etc, using just their first name while at the same time generating an unlimited amount of hits to their website. Begining January of 2009 thru July 2009, first names may be registered to enter into this contest. Only one first name may be registered. When someone visits our site to see if their name is taken, their first instinct when they do see that their name is taken, is to click on their name to see who has claimed their name. This is how registered participants will gain an unlimited amount of hits to their website. With the services from www.linkcounter.com, they are able to keep track of all unique clicks for each name on our website during our contest period from August 2009 till August 2010. At the end of the contest, it will then be determined who has the most famous name based on the most amount of clicks. The winner will receive one full year of promotion as well as win some great prizes. So for $1.00, for one year and six months, you have the chance to get an unlimited amount of hits to your website.
Description: Claim Your Name For Fame is an online marketing and advertisement promoter company.

Full Description: With the success of Secret Salons in the UK, Web Development and SEO Agency Orchid Box is helping to launch a new service for the Italian market. The innovative website uses data from Facebook Places and an array of other sources to provide a useful service for the Italian market. ConsigliamiDove.it translates to “suggest me where“ and consists of user generated reviews of events, restaurants, place recommendations for any type of business and services in the Italian market. With so much to see and do in Italy, the website aims to be the first point of call for anyone who for example is looking for bars in Rome or a solicitor in Naples. The service is absolutely free for business to advertise on and for consumers to write and read reviews about services and products. Users do not need to be registered to write a review, although the website is monitored by the site administrators. The idea is simple, to have reviews on business and services, for example, if someone recommended a dentist, the user can use the Consigliami Dove website to see what other people are saying about the practice. Alternatively if a user is looking to go to a restaurant in Milan, they can use the website to find and review the restaurant. Qype, the Yelp of Europe, is the only site to offer a similar service in Italy, they have raised 3.5 million euros from Vodafone Ventures and a further 3.0 million euros from its existing three investors, Advent Venture Partners, Partech International and Wellington Partners. Launched in 2006, Qype allows users to browse and add reviews for restaurants, hotels, bars and other establishments. Consigliami Dove isn’t currently looking for funding but advertisers are welcome to enquire about advertising on the site. ConsigliamiDove.it currently has over 200,000 Italian businesses on its database and aims to reach 500,000 by January 2011. Whether you are looking for florists in Florence or a Hotel in Sicily, ConsigliamiDove.it is the perfect site for your query.
Industries: Advertising, E-Commerce, Hospitality, Internet, Marketing, Social Media, Travel
Description: Find your local business

Industry Groups: Advertising, Commerce and Shopping, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Sales and Marketing, Travel and Tourism

Full Description: Dada S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides community and entertainment services through Web and mobile, as well as domain, hosting, and online advertising solutions worldwide.  The company operates in two divisions, Dada.net, dedicated to Digital Music, Entertainment and on-line gaming services through web and mobile, and Dada.pro focused on professional services for online presence and advertising. Dada’s offer to the final user is focused on digital products and services including Digital Music, Mobile Applications, Mobile and Social Community services. Play.me (available for US and Italian customers, www.play.me / www.dada.it) is Dada’s Digital Music brand: it offers an "in the cloud" music experience: music always available, stored across the web and mobile, without having to download any software, unlimited access to its catalogue at a very convenient price.  Dada also develops mobile music applications and distributes value added services in more than 15 countries. The Dada Group also includes Blogo, the most visited vertical blog network in Italy, Splinder, the popular brand in the blog and social networking sector, Fueps, whose activities are focused on social gaming services, and the Giglio Group who produces and broadcasts two television music channels offered on the Sky platform (Music Box and Live!) which launched the digital terrestrial channel Play.me TV in the third quarter.  Since June 2009, following the contribution of its holding in the joint venture Dada Entertainment, Sony Music now holds 13% of Dada.net share capital. With over 470 thousand business clients and more than 1.6 million domains under management Dada.pro is one of the leading European companies in the registration of internet domains and the management of online presence for both individuals and businesses. This division also includes the activities of Register.it, Nominalia, Namesco, the Amen Group and Poundhost. In April 2009 Dada launched Simply (www.simply.com), the online advertising platform of the Group which allows small to medium sized businesses to efficiently plan their advertising campaign utilising marketing tools for the selection of targets and analysis of results and website owners to expand advertising revenue.

Full Description: Enco is a 3.0 start-up with a clear mission: to give people back control over their own energy, 100% renewable of course. Enco is a fundamental step towards a zero-emission economy, more people-centred than profit-centred.  How? By creating energy communities in a simple and transparent way, equipping citizens with the tools they need to produce energy on the roof of their homes, and share it with their neighbours, without having to deal with bureaucracy. Enco's vision is a world in which everyone benefits from the economic, environmental and social advantages of an energy community, and is empowered to produce energy.  Specifically? Enco installs photovoltaic panels and storage systems, creates and manages energy communities, and distributes the proceeds fairly among the participants. Full Description: Everyware Technologies is a spin-off of the University of Milan and wants to become a leader in developing mobile computing solutions by offering location-based services and by preserving, at the same time, users’ privacy in terms of position and displacements.  The first app for mobile devices that uses this technology, as a result of more than 3 years of researches about privacy concerning topics, is PCube (http://pcube.everywaretechnologies.com), available both for iPhone and Android platforms. PCube notifies to the user his friends’ geographic proximity, without releasing to the server any information about his position and allowing, at the same time, to control the precision of the information given to the other users, thanks to a Google Maps interface. It is possible to protect users’ privacy and identity thanks to cryptography, anonymisation and spatial-temporal generalization techniques that allow clouding the data sent to the server. In the near future will be also provided a lot of other services, such as: •	Facebook, Twitter and Foursquare integration with also the chance to post on each one of these social networks •	Chat system and Let’s Meet system with the possibility to talk and plan a meeting with the other users •	Social gaming based on a rewarding system with virtual money The solution we offer has exclusive skills as compared to the competitors (location sharing and geographical proximity services such as Google Latitude, Facebook Places and Foursquare).  For example thanks to Google Latitude it is possible to see the geographical position of a user and be notified if a friend is in proximity (the same of PCube), but this service acquires position data and doesn’t offer a clear control of the precision used by someone in acquiring the position of some other.  Similarly, Facebook Places and Foursquare only offer narrow privacy control to the users and acquire position data (the so called check-in) on their servers with the goal of free sharing between the users and to convey location-based promotions. There is only another app that offers a service based on an effective privacy control system. Its name is Locaccino and it comes from years of researches by a spin-off of Carnegie Mellon University. It allows indicating exactly some areas in which the geographic position can be released, with the possibility to specify when this information is accessible. PCube Technology offers the same functions without delivering to the server any information about the other users’ position. Because of this innovative skills and deployment prospects, one of the main goals is to implement an international patent. Other advantages of EveryWare Technology, that also represent sources of company’s differentiation over a long period of time, are: •	The owning of high technical competences and the ability to quickly acquire new ones, in order to preserve competitiveness in a changing environment. •	The possibility to have the access to a lot of innovative ideas due to the active members’ participation to international research activities.  •	The availability of apps prototypes already realized thanks to scientific research in privacy management field •	Privileged access channels with companies and institutions thanks to the relationships network of the University of Milan.
Industries: Internet, Location Based Services, Mobile, Privacy
Description: Mobile, App, Privacy, Social Network
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Mobile, Navigation and Mapping, Privacy and Security

Full Description: Gelio is a geo-targeted mobile App, which intelligently delivers real time promotions and live offers from local businesses depending on where you are. We were formed in 2014 by two founders from the daily deal, e-commerce and financial services sectors with a vision to create a mobile first platform to encourage the growth and sustainability of local commerce. Unlike other platforms, Gelio is built to match your business needs. We are in the business of sending customers to local businesses and not hitting your bottom line. Gelio is considered by the industries we serve as an extension of brand marketing and ultimate customer satisfaction. Our platform is bespoke to each merchant that chooses to use our simple, flexible and low cost alternative to promote their business and attract local customers. Gelio puts the marketing and control of offers back into the hands of local businesses. Our merchants create their own offers, choose their discount, the number available, validity times and decide when to publish their promotions to suit their business needs. Other marketing platforms are damaging small brands with heavy discounts that don’t drive sustainable customer acquisition. Gelio puts that right for you. Our platform is built to serve your needs and we’re so merchant focused we’re not interfering with your cash flow either. Gelio customers pay you as normal at the till point after showing their Gelio verification screen. No more laborious redeeming of codes or waiting for your heavily deducted revenue to be paid. Just more customers and more money straight into your hands the traditional way! Gelio is all about maximising local commerce, bringing in customers at the right times to the right places. We are your bespoke marketing platform, helping you reach and engage the best customers. Please feel free to browse our site, tell your friends, download the app and enjoy the benefits of Gelio today.
Industries: Advertising, E-Commerce, Location Based Services, Mobile, Mobile Apps

Full Description: Big data and growing use of on-board sensors are pushing work on shop floors to new heighs of speed and productivity. But the human interaction with all these technologies is still made through desktops or tablets, which are not designed for daily usage in industrial environments. Thus, the company has developed and manufactured augmented reality goggles for industries. GlassUp is on the market with GlassUp F4 since February 2017. F4 are AR eyewears designed to act as a support in terms of time saving and functionality for operators in professional and industrial fields. The eyewear has all the features of a protective mask and allows making use of contents such as videos, images, instruction manuals and any type of content able to back up a work process without using hands. In this way,  the user can be focused on action. F4 can be used stand alone or in pairs with a dashboard which allows remote assistance and remote machineries maintenance routines. On the job training is another fundamental function. As software house, moreover, we are able to create custom applications.

Full Description: Grow the Planet is a social network for hobby farmers—literally anybody who grows their own veggies and herbs. On the website they can find information on plants and vegetables, growing skills and techniques, hints and tips for the needed activities. They can share opinions and connect to help each other out and, if they wish, exchange their produce.  However, the core of the platform and its most powerful feature lie in the possiblity for each user to design their vegetable garden, balcony or shelves, and receive hints according to their specific situation (type of vegetables, season, climate zone, weather, stage of growth etc.). This is possible thanks to extensive research on growth statistics and the integration with climate data and user input. The platform then allows the users to schedule and keep track of activities, to-do's and the overall state of their garden, and to share them with the internal community and over other social networks. The platform will launch in September 2011.
Industries: Communities, DIY, Internet, Lifestyle, Organic, Social Media, Sustainability, Tutoring

Full Description: " Il talento che verrà " is a young and dynamic company . Born from the passion of some guys who see in the growth of young people can be the only food for the journey out of the crisis affecting the world of football. history The talent that will be born as a blog which presents the most exciting young talents in world football . In June 2013, the founders Arturo Ferraro Pelle, Luca Pagano and Luca Zilioli decide to give life to an online portal enabling new sections for youth football. Today, a few months after birth , " The talent they will come" is a reality with over thirty employees , including journalists, observers , and computer graphics . The preparation is active in the main social Facebook , Twitter , YouTube and Google + and boasts over 10,000 fans. TCV , thanks to the collaboration between observers and journalists , is to seek and present the best young players and coaches in Serie A , B, Lega Pro and football abroad. On them is drawn a card that tries to give the historical dimension , tactics and technique of the young man in question . The choice of players is always very careful and tends to faithfully report all the features of the athlete Starting from the month of August has integrated drafting new sections to ensure a complete and consistent to its followers , with betting tips , fantasy football analysis and insights. The preparation from the month of October is a 360 ° all the news related to the Primavera championship , with specific sections for all leagues abroad. The main objective is to become in a few months, the leading portal for youth football through a constant and reliable service . In addition, the editors have created the first database of all the official Twitter account of the players in Serie A and B. A unique service in Italy that allows various discounts for journalists and fans. The projects of reality TCV are not linked solely to the drawing . The idea is to spread a name, a brand and with it a philosophy.
Description: Il talento che verrà "" is a young and dynamic company . Born from the passion of some guys who see in the growth of young people.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: The Innowatio group offers its clients innovative services for an integrated management of their energy issues, namely energy outsourcing based on the determination of specific benchmarks and the subsequent sharing of the benefits achieved through Innowatio’s management. In addition to the revolution of traditional contractual provisions, this innovation adopts a holistic approach to energy issues, and transforms the client/supplier relationship into a partnership, where the manager’s remuneration is directly connected to their work, consequently preventing any conflict of interest. By synergistically tackling both price issues (dynamic portfolio management) and those related to quantity (efficiency energy, ESCo), considerably more benefits can be achieved. This approach allows Innowatio to transform the traditional passive demand approach into a proactive approach. In order to offer value to big energy-consuming industries, Innowatio has placed itself on the market as demand side manager boasting an integrated approach resulting from the combination of two main types of services, aiming to cut energy costs and improve the understanding of energy markets, thus allowing to grasp the opportunities arising therefrom: energy portfolio management and energy streamlining.- In order to offer value to large energy-consuming industries, Innowatio has positioned itself on the market as a demand-side manager with an integrated approach resulting from the combined effect of two main types of services, which aim to cut energy costs and improve the understanding of energy markets, allowing clients to take advantage of the consequent opportunities: energy portfolio management and energy efficiency. The energy portfolio management service is already evolutionary compared with what is generally offered by Third Party Intermediaries in the UK market, as it also involves real supplies and is not limited to supply consulting and tendering. Innowatio implements all the operations chosen by its clients, making the group both the manager of both their portfolio and physical supplies, which are conveyed and invoiced by us.
Description: Innowatio group offers its clients innovative services for an integrated management of their energy issues,
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Investitori Associati Società di Gestione del Risparmio (SGR) S.p.A. is the management company of the closed-end investment fund Investitori Associati IV. The founding partners and large part of the management team have extensive experience in the private equity sector, developed in particular within Investitori Associati S.p.A., the Italian investment advisor to Investitori Associati, Investitori Associati II e Investitori Associati III since 1993.  With total fully invested capital of Euro 475 million, these three funds have completed 22 investments in industrial and service companies mainly located in Italy, resulting in being considered one of the most active and successful private equity firms in the Italian market.  By virtue of the capital under management and the track record of its management team, today Investitori Associati SGR can be considered one of the main players in the sector and is well positioned to take advantage of the investment opportunities offered by the Italian private equity market.

Full Description: Introduction MarketMind provides reliable and safe stock market forecasts, for professional or anyone who might be interested.  	 Users can share their computer's spare computational power through our shared computing system. In this way they get free forecasts and contribute to the MarketMind system. There's no need to install or download anything: all computation is performed via browser.  By using our user's computing power as well, MarketMind can generate an analysis capacity wiyhout precedents. Technology MarketMind is based on HABITAT: a resident virtual ecosystem on our servers where thousands of neural networks forecast market fluctuations. HABITAT applies the law of evolution: only the best neural networks survive and are used to generate financial forecasts. Darwinian natural selection allows the populations of neural networks in the HABITAT to evolve continuously improving their ability to predict the stock markets. This allows different populations of neural networks to coexist and compete within HABITAT, each characterised by different prediction strategies. Every day, under the constant supervision of our systems, new evolution lines arise and others expire in a continuous process of improvement towards more accurate and reliable forecasts. Our control systems constantly monitor the populations and lineages present in HABITAT and, using the best experts, they get the financial forecasts that we deliver to users every day.
Description: MarketMind Research is a Italy based technology advisory company.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Milk Honey & Rum bring the delicious recipes of Piemonte all around the world. Is the #1 website of Piemonte recipes for Internationals. Piemonte is a NW Italian region, famous for wines (Barolo, Barbera, Nebbiolo, Erbaluce, Barbaresco, and hundreds more), Truffles of Alba, Chocolate like Gianduiotti, Agnolotti pasta, Tajarin pasta, Bagna Caoda, Grissini, and many other more specialties. I really love to help people to taste the flavor of my childhood, that I continue to love and taste. What is Piemonte cuisine? Piemonte cuisine is very different from the Italian you already know. It has surprisingly new delicious, healthy and easy recipes. 1 Surprisingly new delicious recipes Not the standard Italian cuisine Piemonte have created a unique cuisine, by combining flavors, recipes, ingredients and traditions from the world. Because of the history of  their territories the Piemonte cuisine couldn’t be considered similar to the one that abroad is called Italian, that is from Lazio, Campania, and other Middle and South Italy Regions. We have had many nordic and international influences from France to the East. Piemonte cuisine has two delicious kind of cuisine. The noble cuisine of the court of Savoy, and those from the peasant tradition. The cuisine of the court has very rich dishes that were served in the sumptuous banquets of the court such as chocolate, Zabaione, Mixed Bollito and Piemonte Fried Mixed. The peasant cuisine has recipes made with simple ingredients such as panissa, Bagna Cauda, Finanziera. Finest wine pairing. Piemonte wines are very famous all around the world. We have a very ancient history of winemakers, vines and grapes. In Piemonte each food has its wine to be paired with. It’s a culture, it’s a lifestyle, it’s a tradition. We ever taste food with specific wine, we love to taste different pairings and enjoy the combined flavors. 2 Healthy recipes High variety of ingredients, many vegetables, few meat and fats. Meat was consumed just in few occasions. We can say that Piemonte cuisine is mostly, in its everyday shape, a vegetarian cuisine. Eggs, milk and butter were used to fill the dish in the past, whilst meat was used only in special occasions like holidays and sundays. Moreover our granny were used to cook small farm animals like chicken, rabbit, quail, rather than the big cattle. 3 Easy recipes A friendly way of cooking The traditional Piemonte recipes have born in a time when cooking was made while women were doing other things. Therefore recipes must be easy to prepare, with quick and few steps, and short time of cooking. It is a very modern cuisine. 3 Things I do to simplify recipes To make Piemonte recipes really feasible for a worldwide home cooking I adapt every recipe. Behind each recipe there’s a whole world of research and study to let you taste the original flavor that you would love to experience if you be right here. I adapt ingredients, ease procedures and take procedure pictures. 1 Adapt Ingredients International substitute for the regional ingredients Each and every ingredient must be available in your countries. I’m very selective in researching the right ingredients that could fit the recipes instead of the local ones, because they must preserve the original flavor of the recipes. At the end of selection and testing the smell and flavor must be delicious, unique and original. International Ingredients measures Ingredients measures are provided converted. You find cups and ounces instead of milliliters and grams. You find also an Ingredient converter, just in case. 2 Ease Procedures I simplify procedures, appliances and timing of each recipe For every recipe I organize the procedures steps so that you find easy to go through the recipe. I adapt the procedures to our appliances turning the oldest instructions to a modern way of cooking. I adapt the procedures and appliances also to fit the timing of recipes so they could be prepared in shortest time. 3 Step-by-Step Photo Instructions A picture is worth a thousand words I take pictures of every action that my hands do. I think that sometimes things seems difficult just because you have never seen them before. I take photo of every things that I do, so it is just like if you are in my kitchen while I’m cooking. You can check the recipe in progress and do it “with me”. High quality recipes Recipes are released only when they are perfect for my standards. This means three things: 1 Oversimplified recipes Recipes must be really feasible and friendly for a worldwide cooking. I’m very selective in this process. 2 Delicious flavor recipes Easy but delicious. I never miss flavor to ease a recipe. Piemonte recipes simplify my work, because they are easy enough to be oversimplified never missing great savor. 3 Mouth-watering photos recipes When a recipe is ready the scent in my house is amazing. If you were here… Right! I send you gorgeous pictures! 1 Recipe at a time Hastily done is ill done I want to provide surprisingly new delicious, healthy and easy recipes. I spend great time to do that. I love to see you happy cooking and tasting my new recipes. Food is the basic way to take care.
Industries: Communities, E-Commerce, Food and Beverage, Lifestyle, Retail
Description: The #1 Website of Piemonte Recipes for Internationals

Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Community and Lifestyle, Food and Beverage

Full Description: Neptuny is a solution provider of IT Performance Optimization and Capacity Planning solutions for IT data centers and networks. For more than a decade, Neptuny solutions have been crucial to help customers in different industries (Telco, Banking, Insurance, Travels, Energy, Retail, etc.) to improve the business outcome of their infrastructures and services. Neptuny has been named "Cool Vendor in IT Operations 2009" by Gartner. Caplan™, Neptuny flagship product, is the agent-less, holistic, automated and business-aware IT Capacity  Planning solution that has been successfully adopted by major worldwide companies to optimize, rationalize and plan their IT infrastructures.   Caplan™ provides sophisticated analyses, forecasting, analytical modeling and reports capabilities while requiring low operational efforts, thanks to features such as its agent-less architecture, high degree of automation and easy-to-use web dashboard. Caplan™ is aligned to ITIL® V3 best practices and provides out-of-the-box integrations with other IT Service Management processes and tools, that enable customers to adopt a stepwise yet integrated approach to Capacity Management process.  Caplan™ enables customers to reduce costs and avoid risks by making it possible to evaluate future needs of critical infrastrcutures with respect to business drivers. In particular, Caplan™ helps customers to first consolidate data-centers by defining optimal allocation plans and then safely manage virtualized environments.   Caplan™ is also available as Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), thus bringing Capacity Management to small/medium-sized enterprises that cannot afford costs associated to on-site implementations, or even to larger (Enterprise-level) companies that need to quickly setup Capacity Planning for a critical project (e.g. design of production environments from load testing results).
Industries: Cloud Computing, Enterprise Software, Software, Virtualization
Description: Neptuny provides IT performance optimization and capacity planning solutions for IT data centers and networks.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Software

La volontà di generare una nuova esperienza di fronte ad un fenomeno tanto diffuso ha trovato sede qui, tra obiettivi e soluzioni in risposta a svariate problematiche. Da ora si potrà finalmente essere parte degli eventi a cui si è interessati senza doversi più preoccupare di spese ulteriori, degli spostamenti lungo la penisola e di controllare lo stato del numero di biglietti venduti e/o ancora disponibili. OnGigz intende inoltre promuovere socialmente la condivisione di un evento, offrendo la possibilità di vivere momenti di ogni genere: dalla visione in coppia alla visione di gruppo, passando per le famiglie e giungendo allo spettatore solitario.

Full Description: They live in a generation where the use of social media is becoming too important for their lives. In addition to sharing information and content, social media have become very popular because they allow people to use the internet to establish personal or business relationships. It is said that social media serves to compensate for the lack of sociality of the modern and post-industrial era. But is it really possible to define ‘sociality’ an interaction or approach among individuals in a totally virtual way? Social living should be built on natural social interactions. They should go back to verbal confrontation, to communicate through words, looks, and try to avoid confrontation with other individuals just behind a computer screen or a smartphone. But if a person wants to organize a real activity involving other people using some popular social media, how can he organize it without first knowing these individuals? For those reasons It’s been developed a new platform to promote the return to classical social interactions and to get to know new people without the use of instant messaging, promoting the ‘face to face’ socializing instead of a virtual acquaintanceship, this innovative platform allows people to organize activities all over the world involving all its users, without having to personally know the participants in the activities, and without having to spend hours in front of a keyboard or a phone screen.
Description: Plansaround promotes the return to classical social interactions and to get to know new people without the use of instant messaging.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: PRIZEME is a shopping “boosting” tool that matches perfectly the interest of end-customers (users) and of small and medium sized shops (clients). When customers make actions related to a store, they are granted a certain number of “PRIZY” that are worth discounts, free goods and other related prizes.  In this first phase, when a shop subscribe on the platform, we invest by granting a package of PRIZY that they will distribute to shoppers. PRIZEME will collect then the behavioural statistics of end-customers (users) and will capitalise a growing portfolio of highly profiled customers. When the size of this portfolio will reach the trade-off point, we will be able to offer to new shops a ready wallet of customers, so we will charge them an entry-fee. On the shop side, the platform allows owners to monitor and quantify the augmented customers’ traffic in their stores as well as other important statistics useful to decide marketing actions. Other company have already entered this market in few countries. Some of them only grants points over check-in or purchase in. Others decided to grant over some action, like publishing shops’ photos on socials. Some other offers points whenever a mission has been accomplished. PRIZEME is the synthetises of all these business developed in the world. By deeply studying others companies’ models and by capitalising the full proximity platform, our team could make a system that is the most complete and that can perfectly respond to the all market demands.
Industries: Big Data, Digital Marketing, Gamification, Internet of Things, Loyalty Programs, Mobile Advertising, Mobile Apps
Description: Prizeme is an innovative marketing system that allows to increase the engagement and visibility of its customers.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Advertising, Apps, Data and Analytics, Gaming, Internet Services, Mobile, Sales and Marketing, Software
Founders: Angelo Napolano, Antonio Esposito, Gianluca Astuti, Marco De Landro, Vincenzo Chianese

Vogliamo veicolare nel cuore dell’Europa, in Polonia, e in Russia (successivamente anche in altri paesi), il frutto di chi produce e offre servizi in Italia. Vogliamo mettere in vetrina il frutto del loro lavoro, creatività e offerta, a favore di nuovi consumatori affamati di vero “Made in Italy”. Tutti i prodotti e servizi devono essere certificati e garantiti con il marchio “Made in Italy”. Le aziende selezionate, che faranno parte della piattaforma PuntoIT, dovranno inoltre garantire, per i paesi in cui la piattaforma opera, il prezzo più basso rispetto a qualsiasi altra offerta si possa trovare attraverso altri portali, anche rispetto al loro sito. Full Description: Quokka is a real time geosocial network that allows its users to see what happens everywhere through geolocation. Quokka srl is a tech company based in Rome that built technologies B2C. Quokka has received more than 250k $ in seed investments from Italian and USA's angels investors.  Our first project Quokka app reached more than 20.000 users in less than a year. It was a location - based social network, iOS and Android platform, which enabled users to be protagonists of their local ecosystems through their contents. Quokka's revenue model was a location based adv. Quokka has become famous in Rome since the launch of the digital fight between "Roma Nord" and "Roma Sud" on July '16. It was a location based social experiment that engaged thousands of Romans to share more than 6k pictures per week on the platform. We closed our service on December 2016. Our team decided it was time to pivot to new things in the b2c market.  On February 2017 we launched our app "Razmataz - the fastest way to share your location with your friends". Razmataz reaches thousands of teenagers and got a satisfactory initial traction, but not enough to allows the company to go in revenue and find the product/market fit.  We are currently working and testing several projects to find the definitive plan that works.
Description: Quokka is a real time geosocial network that allows its users to see what happens everywhere through geolocation.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: We are launching in Italy and then we'll launch globally. We are looking for someone can help us paying (high) tax to build a society in Italy. If a lawyer is unable to attend a hearing or has another unavoidable commitment, he is forced to search through long lists and make numerous phone calls to find a colleague available to replace him, resulting in a considerable waste of time. Also the payment, often made in person, can create many problems. The purpose of Substitute Audience is to ensure that all this does not happen again. With Substitute Hearing, you just need to request a replacement by filling out the form and making the payment. Immediately, a matching algorithm will find the perfect replacement (it is not possible to entrust a divorce lawsuit to a lawyer specializing in economic law, for this reason we will make sure, depending on the description provided, that the requests are categorized in the right category) and will send him an email to ask for availability. Once the availability is confirmed, the person who requested the replacement can choose to refuse the replacement, or simply not to do anything and enjoy the time savings. Once the chosen replacement has sent all the documents attesting to his participation in the hearing and a summary of what has been said, he will be credited with the payment, less a commission for the operation of the service. There is also a ranking system that rewards substitutes with a higher vote and penalizes those with lower votes, to ensure an ever-increasing quality of service. In addition, we plan to add different categories of replacements soon and the possibility of requesting a replacement by phone via automatic service. The business is scalable in every country where lawyers are present. In the event that the replacement does not appear, a penalty will be applied and will be immediately removed from the service. To ensure an efficient and safe service, there is an emergency replacement system in the event that the replacement does not appear for any reason at the hearing scheduled 15 minutes before. The substitute lawyer is then required to send a message to the Replacement Hearing as confirmation of attendance.  In addition, there will be the possibility of subscribing to a subscription that includes a fixed number of possible substitutions, telephone substitutions and other benefits.
Industries: Consulting, Legal, Legal Tech, Subscription Service
Description: Simple Replacements for lawyers
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Shicon started in Milan, Italy, in 2010. It was funded by two young italian startups, Employees Only, run by Enrico Aprico and focused on new media, and Taaac, run by Michele Simonato and Matteo Lai, focused on innovative design projects and new business models.  Shicon has now offices in 5 countries: other than Italy, there are operating offices in London, San Francisco, Mumbai and Rio De Janeiro. Full Description: Sinba is an application that, without the need of any additional in-store hardware, allows you to buy in physical stores autonomously. Money is subtracted from the credit card or from the bank account, according to the user’s choice. Full Description: SplitGigs is a social network that helps emerging bands or musicians find gigs to play, through a simple but highly effective idea: the "SplitGig".  A SplitGig is an exchange of gigs - i.e. I let your band play at my gig, then you return the favor by letting my band play at your gig.  Both bands end up with an extra gig... another opportunity to get their music heard.  SplitGigs affords any band or musician the opportunity to expand the possibilities open to them through a dedicated, intuitive and effective solution that allows them to organise a tour and get to play their music live on stages far from home. Thanks to SplitGigs, all this is within reach. Everything is underpinned by the concept of sharing.  SplitGigs will help booking agencies, managers and record labels as well, to manage their artists live acts. SplitGigs is growing in H-Farm. Founded in Italy in 2005, H-Farm is an international platform, a unique organization redefining the role of venture capital and incubator. H-Farm culture is about Humanity. Simplicity. Collaboration. Creativity. Rationality. Passion. Curiosity. Innovation. These words express the mind of H-People. It's not about the identity of a single company but rather a shared culture, a framework to innovative start-ups to grow and flourish. H-Farm developed 3 epicentres - Italy, Seattle, Mumbai - 3 market areas, 3 different cultures that work responding to specific market demands, to enable the business at international level. H-Farm is the next generation incubator.
Description: SplitGigs is a website that allows artists to find partners for performances.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Events, Financial Services, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio

Full Description: SportAround helps sport fans following their passion and their favourite sports, answering their most common and annoying questions during match-days: “Is there a nearby place broadcasting the match?”, “Is there a pub or restaurant that most fits my needs?”, “Which is the best one to go?”.  SportAround shows exactly which are the closest or the best places broadcasting events of the most followed sports on TV. Therefore, fans can directly book a table in the chosen place, also inviting friends, or even ask them to vote for their favourite place in a poll. Their experiences with SportAround are also enhanced by two other in-app, live features: Facts, a live score feed to check the main sport actions and statistics in real time; and Yaks, a geolocalized chat to comment and exchange opinions during the match. Finally, we aim at building intangible values around the concept of “being fan”. That is why we introduced a gamification system with a full set of contextual actions to surprise users at first, and consequently engage and retain them. In order to gather the most precise, exhaustive and reliable information about sport broadcasts, we created SportAround Manager, a tool that we offer to our business customers: sport bars, pubs and restaurants. SportAround Manager allows them to: enefit of broadcast scheduling, simply choosing the sport events they want to show from a pre-set list; manage bookings real time and be alerted by push notifications; improve their traction by both showing their profile and services to a targeted audience, and advertising special offers in a Deal section; collect business statistics on user’s interaction; coverage and conversion of their profiles and their offers in an Insights section.
Description: Sport fan can find the closest or highest rated pubs that broadcast sports they want to watch and book a table.

Full Description: During these years I’ve read thousands of stories about start-ups from all over the world. I’ve noticed the growth of attention towards this phenomenon which has almost become a trend. When I launched my start-up in 2006, little was still known on technologies, difficulties and best practices in the field. At the time I would have probably made less mistakes if there had been all the information it is now available on this topic. Nowadays you can find so many forums and blogs with exhaustive answers and comments covering  every single aspect of how to set up and run a business. However, I noticed that nobody has ever dealt with whether these initiatives end in a positive or negative way. It is well-known that the mortality rate of start-ups is very high. Within the first three years of life only 1 out of 10 start-ups reaches the breakeven but… what about the other 9? What happens to them? Why didn’t they survive? What could they have done differently? What’s the perspective of those involved in the failure? That’s the goal of this blog: telling stories of those who didn’t make it and learn which lessons can be learnt. The focus won’t be on how well I write in Italian and explain the same things in English, but rather on trying to understand whether you share my enthusiasm for this topic. Every  contribution is welcome!
Description: Blog talking about startup bankrupt
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Surgery Academy is an online service used for watching broadcasting live and prerecorded videos of surgeries through a 360 degree immersive operating theatre experience. Surgery Academy plans to industrialize, socialize and collect a curation of surgical interventions. The learning program (MOOC-like) is developed for head mounted displays such as the Oculus Rift and Samsung Gear VR. It’s also available on PCs and mobile devices. Surgery Academy uses Meta (AR side) and GoPro (VR side) cameras then renders the video themselves in order to create an augmented and virtual reality experience for medical students and professionals who are watching surgical procedures. It helps med students to integrate their studies and improve their knowledge by accessing to extra informations (such as patient’s vital signs, patient’s medical imaging and so on) A student can then watch this footage with a virtual reality headset: the stereoscopic 3D and the wide field of view create a striking immersive effect. The student can then replay the surgery in detail and watch it through the eyes of the surgeon (POV), empowering his experience with the 3D Imagery.
Industries: Augmented Reality, EdTech, Education, Health Care, MOOC, Video, Video on Demand, Video Streaming, Virtual Reality

Full Description: First of all YourSocialMap.com is Free for ever. The importance of your social network is how it is profiled. It's useless  to have hundreds of friends and to know only a part of it. YourSocialMap.com has an human interface that helps you to categorize and describe your contacts. YourSocialmap.com is based on the "Dunbar's Number" theory that limit the number of people with one can mantein stable relationship. These are relationships in which an individual knows who each person is, and how each person relates to every other persons Proponents assert that numbers larger than this generally require more restrictive rules, laws, and enforced norms to maintain a stable, cohesive group. No precise value has been proposed for Dunbar's number. It lies between 100 and 230, but a commonly used value is 150. (Wikipedia). YourSocialMap.com with an easy and fast human interface allow you to update and list all your connections for ever! With YourSocialMap.com  you can find out even if you belong to one of the following status: - Broker  (with 150 connections) - Linker   (with 300 connections) - Bridger (with 600 connections) - Master Network (with 1000 connections)
Description: YourSocialMap.com is a way to visualize

Full Description: Yoorba is a business HUB, a social network where business companies can find partners, competitors, suppliers, customers and interact with them. How can business companies find the fastest/cheapest/best suppliers today? How can they choose the right partner to distribute their products? How can they make free marketing researches? How can they interact with all of them? Search engines require time, skills and you have to ask the right question to be answered correctly. Chambers of commerce and business associations require money and always lack of information. Yoorba is a free business social network where a company add simple tags (keywords) specifying what OFFERS (products, tools, services...) and what IS LOOKING FOR (equipment, products, partnerships...). Automatically Yoorba will suggest to the company some possible partnership, due to the matches of the WHAT I OFFER/WHAT I'M LOOKING FOR tags. Simple but effective. Moreover, the company has his own profile with bio, photo section (for catalogues, menus...), business card downloadable from all companies became partners, and there is the possibility to add news with everyone. Connection to major SN are available (twitter connect, facebook share...).
Description: Yoorba is a business HUB, a social network where business companies can find partners, competitors, suppliers, customers and interact.

Full Description: WinMedical brings to the market a modular, scalable and easy to use platform to continuously monitor vital signs of the Patient in hospital and at home: WINPACK. WinPack is the leading wearable modular device for real-time, continuous and simultaneous vital signs monitoring in non-critical care units and at home, offering: Continuous Non Invasive Blood Pressure – cNIPB, 5-Lead ECG, Heart Rate, Pulse Rate, SpO2, Body Temperature, Posture, and Respiration Rate. It is comfortable to wear, easy to use and lightweight. WinPack’s sensor modules enable monitoring of vital signs via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi while customizable alert settings allow early detection of Patient deterioration. WinPack keeps Patients continuously monitored by the medical staff - anytime and anywhere, whether in hospital or at home while offering an effective cost-reduction solution to healthcare providers. WinPack is the first customizable hardware and software solution for any hospital department, and delivers an increase in efficiency and effectiveness of clinical workflows. WinPack has been proven to generate costs savings and increase clinical efficiency for hospitals through several case studies, as well as through its use in hospital departments including: General Medicine, Haematology, Infectious Diseases, Pneumatology, Nuclear Medicine, Oncology, Post Surgical, Gastroenterology and Internal Medicine. WinPack allows: ->    Better Patient care ->    Valuable cost reductions for healthcare providers ->    Significant reduction of clinical risks ->    Considerable reduction of the medical professional liability and litigation risks ->    Seamless continuum of care from hospital to home through better care coordination and clinical collaboration  By connecting doctors, Nurses and Patients, WinPack improves the quality and turnaround time of the care of adults, infants and paediatric Patients in hospital and at home whether in bed or out of bed. Doctors and Nurses may access Patient’s data at anytime using our user friendly software solution on their PCs, Notebooks, Tablets and Smartphones.
Industries: Biotechnology, Health Care, Hospital, Medical, Medical Device, Software
Description: WinMedical is a medical device company developing a modular and wearable monitoring system for Patients in low-acuity care units and home.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Ferdinando Negri, Monica Vatteroni, Pietro Valdastri, Sergio Scapellato, Virginia Pensabene

Full Description: Wami is a tech company that has been working in the travel industry since the end of 2012.  We offer a network of mobile guides that support travelers with a handy tool for smartphones and tablets to discover the best of a territory. The main focus of our guides is to enable a more genuine experience of the territory, providing travelers with everything they need to enjoy a city or a territory at its fullest - from local “pills of wisdom” about what to do and to see there to the access to services related to their staying, such as accommodation, dining, transportation, etc. Although travel is a crowded market, we feel that there is a big opportunity for us.  We’ve always been keen travelers and our experience taught us that when you’re planning a journey, you usually have a hard time trying to discern the trusted sources of information among the many options you have because of fake reviews, outdated information and poor suggestions.  That’s why we created Wami. Wami is like the local friend you would call for advice.  Our mobile guides combine up-to-date information of general interest coming from open data and social data with unique local tips. Content is taken from selected sources, validated and optimized: it features the main points of interest in the area and all the activities you can enjoy during the day and at night. Wami apps are free for the final users and boast state-of-the-art design, offline maps, offline content and a smart geolocated system called Amerigo, that can suggest you what to do according to your position, the time of the day and the weather conditions.  Also, users can count on geolocated services that are displayed in the exact moment they might need them. We take maximum care for the user experience, that we believe should be an outstanding travel experience, enabled and improved by technology. Wami is already on the market with 25 applications - native applications for iOS and Android devices and a HTML5 version that we developed as technical partners of local editors.  We’re currently switching to a new business model, though, where our philosophy is further enhanced and Wami has full control of the process. We are starting to profile our users and implementing a pay-per-person marketing strategy. The company is based in Treviso, Italy. We’re 6 people and 5 of us are software engineers. The founders, Enrico and Carlo, are both developers and they’ve been working together for over ten years. Carlo is currently in London, UK to explore the international opportunities for Wami. Our goal is to entirely cover Italy and to extend our reach to Europe and eventually overseas and we are looking for a seed investment to sustain both product development and business development.
Industries: Location Based Services, Software, Tourism, Travel
Description: Mobile travel guides to discover the gems of a territory from the point of view of locals.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Navigation and Mapping, Software, Travel and Tourism

Full Description: TVBLOB is a software and service development company that has created a TV-centric platform which brings the power of the Web to the TV in a format that makes it easy for anyone to participate using common Web development tools. TVBLOB began seven years ago as an idea in the mind of founder, Fabrizio Caffarelli, who thought: “Why not bring the power of the Web to the television, and let people make their own TV?“ Fabrizio had already had two successful runs in the technology world, the most widely-known being Easy CD, the first easy-to-use software that let people burn CDs inside their personal computers. Five years ago, Fabrizio hooked Pancrazio Auteri, co-founder and our leading video and IT guru, and together they began assembling the team, standing now at about 30 mostly engineers, that continue to make the TVBLOB vision a reality. TVBLOB offers solutions for both professional video streaming and consumer "over-the-top" Internet TV, the latter of which is our primary focus now.
